metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8786 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: pcre2test.c in PCRE2 10.23 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted regular expression.

notes.Note: sbeattie> issue is in pcre2test, which is a test program

criterions.comment: pcre2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
